alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 6:29PM EDT until July 20 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Erie County in northwestern Pennsylvania... Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 629 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Erie to 9 miles north of Girard to near Geneva, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Erie, Meadville, Corry, Edinboro, North East, Union City, Girard, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Linesville, Wattsburg, Canadohta Lake, Pymatuning Central, Riceville, Harmonsburg, Northwest Harborcreek, Lincolnville, Pymatuning North and Harborcreek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are expected to produce widespread wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
